review: I really like Google chromecast. It could be much better if it had bluetooth capability to stream directly from your device in addition to wifi. For example, you can't use this at a hotel because of the requirement to enter a password for the hotel wifi. Also it would be nice to be able to stream everything rather than just certain apps that Google allows. I only use Youtube and Netflix.
author: C. Keebler "Hooyahdiver"

review: I've been debating whether or not I should get one of these for a long time and finally gave in. I don't regret it for a second. It was set up in less than 10 minutes and guided me step by step through the process. What surprised me is that you don't use a remote or chromecast app. You use the actual netflix, hulu, pandora. etc. apps and can transfer the video/audio to your tv when you like. That is awesome because it allows you to play something on netflix, send it to chromecast, and then do other stuff with your phone (like wathc a youtube video). I didn't know that I could watch youtube on chromecase either. As a german immigrant, i can now watch hundreds of german shows on youtube. Get yourself one of these and don't look back!
